description: Odd split numbers: have a nontrivial factorization n=ab, LCM[ a,b ]=1, so that g(a)+g(b)<=g(n), where g(x) is binary order of x.
comments: All even numbers are split numbers, except that prime powers - here powers of 2 - are by definition excluded.
example: s=39 is a split number since s=39=3*13, LCM[ 3,13 ]=1 and g(3)+g(13)=2+4=g(39).
author: _Labos Elemer_
